explanation: [0-0] In the middle, there's a blue frame. Inside the frame, a blond man in white stands behind a girl with pink hair, also dressed in white. Behind them is a door with a skull logo. Above the frame is a character avatar and white subtitles. The background is a bust shot of the blond man.

[0-6] The two walk forward as the camera zooms in. A blue-haired man in blue approaches them. The blue-haired man says something to the blond man as the pink-haired girl continues walking forward. The camera closes in as the blue-haired man pinches the bracelet on the blond man's wrist, lifting his hand while saying something. The shot changes to the blond man looking at him angrily and slapping his hand away. The blue-haired man angrily takes a step forward, staring at the blond man, who also takes a step forward, staring back.
